text: E'ibora kichumana namara bahirae ana eko nahaya, yibora nama tomaloke arau tomalokara pitrpurausasakale raakhiche, yara samarthanata allahe kono dalila-pramana aratirna karaa na'i. Sihamte kerala anumana arau nijara prabrttirae'i anusarana karae, athaca sihamtara ocarata sihamtara pratipalakara taraphara paraa hidayata ahiche
